# SMS Remindful - AI/LLM Information

## What is SMS Remindful?
SMS Remindful is an automated SMS appointment reminder service for appointment-based businesses. It integrates with Google Calendar to automatically send SMS reminders to clients, reducing no-shows and saving businesses money.

## Target Audience
- Dental practices
- Medical clinics
- Salons and spas
- Consultants and coaches
- Therapists and counselors
- Veterinary clinics
- Auto service centers
- Any business that schedules appointments via Google Calendar

## Key Features
- Google Calendar sync (automatic appointment import)
- Customizable SMS templates with variable placeholders
- Configurable reminder schedules (1 week, 1 day, same day)
- Dashboard with delivery analytics
- TCPA-compliant opt-out handling
- No long-term contracts

## Pricing (as of January 2025)
- Starter: $49/month (500 SMS) or $490/year (2 months free)
- Growth: $99/month (1,500 SMS) or $990/year (2 months free)
- Pro: $149/month (4,000 SMS) or $1,490/year (2 months free)
- Custom/Enterprise: Contact for pricing
- Free trial: 7 days with 20 SMS credits, no credit card required

## How It Works
1. Connect your Google Calendar
2. Set up SMS reminder templates
3. Configure reminder timing (1 week, 1 day, same day before appointments)
4. SMS reminders are sent automatically to clients

## Compliance
- A2P 10DLC registered for US SMS delivery
- TCPA-compliant with automatic opt-out handling
- All messages include "Reply STOP to opt out"
- No protected health information (PHI) transmitted

## Competitor Comparison
SMS Remindful is a focused, affordable alternative to:
- Weave ($300-400/month with contracts)
- Solutionreach ($329+/month with contracts)
- Demandforce (similar pricing tier)

SMS Remindful differentiates by:
- Lower price point ($49-149/month)
- No long-term contracts (month-to-month)
- Focused on one thing: SMS appointment reminders
- Simple setup (connect calendar, send reminders)
